mapper.insert: insert into review(no, title, member_no, content, score_star, spo_check) values(#{no}, #{title}, #{member_no}, #{content}, #{score_star}, #{spo_check})
mapper.select: select r.no, member_no, content, write_date, score_star,nickname from review r join member m on r.member_no = m.no where title=#{param1} order by no desc
mapper.update: update review set content=#{content}, score_star=#{score_star}, spo_check=#{spo_check} where no=${no} and member_no=#{member_no}
mapper.delete: delete from review where no=${param1} and member_no=#{param2}
